Splitting Data into Training and Test Data

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

split data

y=titanic.Survived
x=titanic.drop('Survived', axis=1)
x_train,x_test,y_train,y_test=train_test_split(x,y,test_size=0.2)
